member.name: T:SAP.Behaviors.ContentTransitionBehavior
member.summary: Attached behavior that provides animated content transitions for ContentControl elements.

remarks.para: When enabled, this behavior animates the content with a fade-in and slide-up effect when the control is loaded. The animation uses easing for a smooth, natural feel.
Usage in XAML: <ContentControl behaviors:ContentTransitionBehavior.EnableTransition="True" />

member.name: F:SAP.Behaviors.ContentTransitionBehavior.EnableTransitionProperty
member.summary: Identifies the EnableTransition attached property.

member.name: M:SAP.Behaviors.ContentTransitionBehavior.GetEnableTransition(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Gets the value of the EnableTransition attached property.
member.param: The dependency object to get the value from.
member.returns: true if transitions are enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:SAP.Behaviors.ContentTransitionBehavior.SetEnableTransition(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the value of the EnableTransition attached property.
member.param: The dependency object to set the value on.
true to enable transitions; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Called when the EnableTransition property changes.

member.summary: Handles the Loaded event to trigger the transition animation.

member.name: T:SAP.Core.AppVersion
member.summary: Application version information and changelog.

remarks.para: This static class contains the application's version information, release date, and changelog history. Update this class when releasing new versions.
Version Format: MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH - MAJOR: Breaking changes or major new features - MINOR: New features, backwards compatible - PATCH: Bug fixes and minor improvements

member.name: T:SAP.Core.Entities.ExpireWise.ExpirationItem
member.summary: Represents an item with expiration date tracking and status calculation.

remarks.para: This entity tracks products by their expiration dates and calculates status based on configurable thresholds. The actual expiry date is normalized to the last day of the expiry month for consistent comparisons.

Status thresholds:
Critical: 7 days or less until expiration
Warning: 8-30 days until expiration
Good: More than 30 days until expiration
Expired: Past expiration date

member.name: F:SAP.Core.Entities.ExpireWise.ExpirationItem.CriticalDaysThreshold
member.summary: Number of days until expiry to show critical status (7 days or less).

member.name: F:SAP.Core.Entities.ExpireWise.ExpirationItem.WarningDaysThreshold
member.summary: Number of days until expiry to show warning status (30 days or less).

member.name: T:SAP.ViewModels.AllocationBuddyRPGViewModel
member.summary: ViewModel for the Allocation Buddy module, managing inventory allocation across store locations.

remarks.para:
This ViewModel provides functionality for:
Importing allocation data from Excel, CSV, or clipboard
Managing item allocations across multiple store locations
Moving items between locations and an item pool
Exporting allocation data to Excel or CSV
Auto-archiving data to preserve state between sessions
Data is automatically archived before imports and when the application closes, ensuring no data loss between sessions.

member.name: T:SAP.ViewModels.EssentialsBuddyViewModel
member.summary: ViewModel for the Essentials Buddy module, managing essential inventory items and stock levels.

remarks.para:
This module helps track essential items that should always be in stock, providing:
Import of inventory data from Excel or CSV files
Automatic matching against the item dictionary to identify essential items
Filtering by stock status (Normal, Low, Out of Stock, Overstocked)
Automatic addition of missing essential items with zero quantity
Persistent storage of data between sessions

member.name: T:SAP.ViewModels.ExpireWiseViewModel
member.summary: ViewModel for the ExpireWise module, tracking product expiration dates with month-based navigation.

remarks.para:
This module provides comprehensive expiration tracking including:
Month-by-month navigation of expiring items
Visual indicators for critical (≤7 days), warning (≤30 days), and expired items
Import of expiration data from Excel or CSV files
Manual entry of expiration items
Analytics dashboard with expiration trends
Persistent storage of data between sessions
